abstract: Readers will decide where the Frugal Traveler goes next -- and where he'll stay, and how he'll get around.
snippet: Readers will decide where the Frugal Traveler goes next -- and where he'll stay, and how he'll get around.
lead_paragraph: My next trip is shaping up to be a doozy. I'll be heading to ____________, one of a handful of cities I've always wanted to explore. And boy, does it have a fascinating world of ____________ to check out. Because I'm always looking for bargain accommodations, I'll be staying at a ____________. As usual, I won't be taking taxis: transport will be exclusively by ____________. And though I usually shun shopping on my travels, this time I'll be looking for the perfect memento to bring home, the best____________ I can find in town.

headline.main: Where in the World Should Seth Go?
